      Classes in com.agorapulse.gru.minions that implement Minion 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractContentMinion<C extends Client>
      Minion responsible for JSON requests and responses.
      class  AbstractMinion<C extends Client>
      Abstract class which stubs every method except Minion#getOrder() so subclasses may only implement the ones they are interested in.
      class  CookieMinion  
      class  HtmlMinion
      Minion responsible for JSON requests and responses.
      class  HttpMinion
      Minion responsible for HTTP status, uri, method, headers and redirection and forwarding.
      class  JsonMinion
      Minion responsible for JSON requests and responses.
      class  MultipartMinion
      Minion responsible for JSON requests and responses.
      class  ParametersMinion
      Minion responsible for URL parameters.

      Minion responsible for JSON requests and responses.

      Minion responsible for JSON requests and responses.

    • Uses of Minion in com.agorapulse.gru.spring.minions

      Classes in com.agorapulse.gru.spring.minions that implement Minion 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  RequestBuilderMinion
      Request builder minion allows to add more request customisation based on standard MockHttpServletRequestBuilder.
      class  ResultMatcherMinion
      Result matcher minion allows to append standard MockMvc result matchers inside the expect block.
